preface.title: Target Audience
preface.para: This guide is aimed at administrators who want to use the JBoss SPNEGO authenticator to implement silent authentication.

preface.title: Preface
preface.para: Commercial development support, production support and training for the SPNEGO authentication is available through JBoss Inc. The JBoss XACML is a project of JBoss Security in the JEMS product suite.

Authors:
Darran Lofthouse - SPNEGO authenticator developer.
